title: One day i will have a game without Riven, Nidalee, Irelia, Katarina, Lissandra, vi or Leblanc in it.
body: I wonder how many patches before these champions are properly nerfed/reworked instead of being given slap on the wrists, this burst meta is really **s**hit.

Vi is fine. Ward your lanes, and watch the map. If you're going to poke her, do it form a safe distance, and don't let her get close without having some sort of escape mechanism.

She's honestly not as borked as everybody thinks.

> 
> She's honestly not as borked as everybody thinks.

She has 2 abilities that can catch you, 1 or a rather low cooldown and one point and click (which thanks to kass nerfs) no escape has a no longer range.

You cannot outrun a Vi, you must duel her and hope to fuck you win. Which you wont as she's broken as fuck.

And if your ward your lane, you're fine because you can see her coming. You can stun her out or her ult, so CC her to stop her mobility, stay out of her distance.

There are ALWAYS ways around Vi, it's not that hard. Her Q on it's lowest cooldown is.. i think 5-6 seconds? And if you're grouped, she gets bursted down hard as she's pretty squishy even with tank items like warmogs and randuins.

There are worse junglers to be afraid of. I main her, I know her weaknesses. I know how to counter her. Play her for a few days and you'll see how you can survive against a Vi player.


Now, by no means am I a PRO LCS BIG MONEY BIG PLAYS Vi player, but i'd like to think I have a >50% win ration with her.

To me, Vi has just always seemed a really good snowballer. Give her any lead and she can out duel anyone once she engages. That's it, and there are PLENTY of champs who can do that.

I like to think that too. Once she gets her Tri-force and some boots and another damage item (I like to throw on black cleaver for more CDR), she starts to ramp up.

But if you can dump her before then, she's not too good. Kinda like nasus. If you let him farm, he's going to crush you. If you harass him, suddenly he's not as nasty.
